nodes.text: Herald of Bloodgouge was the herald of the fearsome Tusken Raider chieftain Bloodgouge who lived on Tatooine during the Cold War. Bloodgouge and his Herald were killed by Imperials when the chief began marshaling his people for an attack on Outpost Rennar.
Herald of Bloodgouge appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Imperial mission "Test of the Clan" on Tatooine.
